website_summaries.verdict: The SRH1440 headphones are comfortable and ruggedly built with highly detailed sound that will surely thrill audiophiles.
pros: The Shure SRH1440s may be a large, full-size set of headphones, but its lightweight design and gentle earpad pressure make for an extra comfortable fit that fits nicely with its audiophile-endorsed sound
cons: The SRH1440s are large and don't fold flat, limiting their usability for traveling listeners

customer_reviews.title: Excellent lows, harsh highs
customer_reviews.text: I am looking for good reference studio headphones for my music room. I have some Shure 840's that I am completely happy with, but I need a more of an open soundstage and open back headphones will be perfect for mixing and mastering. The SRH1440 has a good solid feel and design, but the highs are way to harsh. The high end hurt my ears. With proper equalization I'm sure many would be happy with these cans, but for mixing, no.
customer_reviews.author: Dale Kath

customer_reviews.title: Impressive and my choice
customer_reviews.text: Quite impressive and the best in its class from a rock fan and a reggae fan. Beyerdynamic teslas, are nice on the first listen but then there are certain frequency ranges which sound metallic and glittery and not in a god way. Audio Technica's go to model was very nice but there was limited separation and they are not comfortable.. Then, I tried the Shure SHR1440......now I am headphone happy. My choice for best headphones between 150 and 300 bucks.
customer_reviews.author: overstand64

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.text: Wow! The sound is incredible. I could wear these all day! Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Laurice

customer_reviews.title: Work perfect in that sense
customer_reviews.text: Don't forget that these are REFERENCE headphones. Work perfect in that sense.
customer_reviews.author: SgtSlothBear

customer_reviews.title: Worth every cent.
customer_reviews.text: These are exceptional open-back headphones. I am more than pleased with the sound quality and comfort. They feel comfortable even after wearing them for extended periods while mixing.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Green

customer_reviews.title: sweet
customer_reviews.text: These are some of the nicest sounding headphones I've listened to. Only have a few hours of use, maybe it will get even better.
customer_reviews.author: Cheesehead

customer_reviews.title: If you love your music . Your going to love these headphones
customer_reviews.text: If you are into music of all spectrum's . This is the headphones for you. I am not going to get technical with the highs and the mids and the lows. But just the sound of this product is so pure and open. And to get the fullness from this product I recommend Fiio headphone amplifiers. I own other types of headphones and I will not throw them under the bus. I am here to tell you about this product. The build quality is high and it is very comfortable to wear for very long time of listening to your favorite music.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Kumer

customer_reviews.title: great for apartment living
customer_reviews.text: as a 74 year old... i wasn't certain this would mean much for my ears.... all i can say ... buy away .... very comfortable and the sound is great to i never knew what i was missing.
customer_reviews.author: OldBill

customer_reviews.title: Top 5 Shure Headphone - BoldList
customer_reviews.text: The Shure SRH1440s have earned a spot on BoldList's Top 5 Shure Headphones list! Pros: - 40 mm neodymium drivers deliver full-range audio with rich bass - Open-back, circumaural design for exceptionally natural sound, wide stereo image, and increased depth of field - Impedance optimized for direct connection to wide range of portable audio devices Check out the rest of the list for other great Shure headphones:
customer_reviews.author: james mccarthy

customer_reviews.title: Sounding Good, Feeling Good
customer_reviews.text: My last few pairs of headophones have been AKG 240, and a pair of Beyerdynamic. These Shure phones sound better than any others I've owned, and feel better than any I've owned. I love them, and recommend them highly.
customer_reviews.author: P. Buchwald

product_meta.title: Shure SRH1440 Professional Open Back Headphones (Black)
product_meta.description: The SRH1440 Professional Open Back Headphones provide full range audio with rich bass in a sleek, attractive design. The premium-padded headband with steel frame provides hours of listening comfort. An included storage case, replacement set of velour earpads, and an additional cable ensures years of uninterrupted listening enjoyment.
feature_bullets: 40 mm neodymium drivers deliver full-range audio with rich, controlled bass
Open-back, circumaural design for exceptionally natural sound, wide stereo image, and increased depth of field
Impedance optimized for direct connection to wide range of portable audio devices
Fully adjustable, premium padded headband with steel frame and sleek, ergonomic design for hours of listening comfort
Oxygen-free copper cable with Kevlar reinforced jacket for superior performance and durability
